common.description: This page provides a detailed view and management of system logs, allowing events monitoring, track activity, and review descriptions of logged actions with precise timestamps.

events.user_created: A new user record {{user_name}} was successfully created by user {{username}}.
events.user_updated: The user {{user_name}} was successfully updated by user {{username}}.
events.user_deleted: The user {{user_name}} was successfully deleted by user {{username}}.
events.role_created: A new role record {{role_label}} was successfully created by user {{username}}.
events.role_updated: The role {{role_label}} was successfully updated by user {{username}}.
events.role_deleted: The role {{role_label}} was successfully deleted by user {{username}}.
events.firm_created: A new firm record {{firm_name}} was successfully created by user {{username}}.
events.firm_updated: The firm {{firm_name}} was successfully updated by user {{username}}.
events.firm_deleted: The firm {{firm_name}} was successfully deleted by user {{username}}.
events.interlocutor_created: A new interlocutror record {{interlocutor_name}} was successfully created by user {{username}}.
events.interlocutor_updated: The interlocutror {{interlocutor_name}} was successfully updated by user {{username}}.
events.interlocutor_deleted: The interlocutror {{interlocutor_name}} was successfully deleted by user {{username}}.
events.interlocutor_promoted: {{promoted}} has been promoted to the main interlocutor in {{firm_name}}, replacing {{demoted}}, by user {{username}}.
events.quotation_created: A new quotation record {{quotation_seq}} was successfully created by user {{username}}.
events.quotation_updated: The quotation {{quotation_seq}} was successfully updated by user {{username}}.
events.quotation_deleted: The quotation {{quotation_seq}} was successfully deleted by user {{username}}.
events.quotation_printed: The quotation {{quotation_seq}} was successfully printed by user {{username}}.
events.quotation_invoiced_marked: The quotation {{quotation_seq}} has been successfully marked as invoiced by user {{username}}.
events.quotation_invoiced: The quotation {{quotation_seq}} has been successfully invoiced under invoice {{invoice_seq}} by user {{username}}.
events.quotation_duplicated: The quotation {{quotation_seq}} has been successfully duplicated as {{duplicate_seq}} by user {{username}}.
events.invoice_created: A new invoice record {{invoice_seq}} was successfully created by user {{username}}.
events.invoice_updated: The invoice {{invoice_seq}} was successfully updated by user {{username}}.
events.invoice_deleted: The invoice {{invoice_seq}} was successfully deleted by user {{username}}.
events.invoice_duplicated: The invoice {{invoice_seq}} has been successfully duplicated as {{duplicate_seq}} by user {{username}}.
events.payment_created: A new payment record {{payment_seq}} was successfully created by user {{username}}.
events.payment_updated: The payment {{payment_seq}} was successfully updated by user {{username}}.
events.payment_deleted: The payment {{payment_seq}} was successfully deleted by user {{username}}.
events.activity_created: A new activity record {{activity_label}} was successfully created by user {{username}}.
events.activity_updated: The activity {{activity_label}} was successfully updated by user {{username}}.
events.activity_deleted: The activity {{activity_label}} was successfully deleted by user {{username}}.
